participant_2.background:
I have broken my arm twice.
My parents were divorced.
I am a widow.
I am a very social person.
I grew up with 6 siblings.

content.text: Hi!
Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies, play video games, and read books. I also like to go to the gym and play sports.
That sounds like fun! I like to do a lot of the same things. I also like to go out with friends and have fun.
That's great! I like going out with friends too.
So, what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch a variety of movies, but I'm especially a fan of action movies, comedies, and horror movies.
I like those types of movies too! I also like to watch documentaries and independent films.
That's cool! I've never really been into documentaries or independent films, but I'm always open to trying new things.
You should! There are some really great documentaries out there.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm especially a fan of science fiction, fantasy, and mystery novels.
I like those genres too! I also like to read nonfiction books, especially about history and science.
That's cool! I've never really been into nonfiction books, but I'm always open to trying new things.
You should! There are some really great nonfiction books out there.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a variety of music, but I'm especially a fan of rock, pop, and hip-hop.
I like those genres too! I also like to listen to electronic music, especially house and techno.
That's cool! I've never really been into electronic music, but I'm always open to trying new things.
You should! There are some really great electronic music out there.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
